Sonu Infratech Sees Revision in Market Assessment Amid Mixed Financial Signals

Sonu Infratech, a microcap player in the construction sector, has experienced a revision in its market evaluation, reflecting nuanced shifts across key analytical parameters. This adjustment highlights evolving perspectives on the company’s financial health, valuation appeal, technical outlook, and overall quality within a challenging sector environment.
